subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: PHILADELPHIA, July 30 (AP) — Chase Utley homered and extended his hitting streak to 31 games Sunday night as the Philadelphia Phillies completed a doubleheader sweep against the Florida Marlins.
snippet: PHILADELPHIA, July 30 (AP) — Chase Utley homered and extended his hitting streak to 31 games Sunday night as the Philadelphia Phillies completed a doubleheader sweep against the Florida Marlins.
